arts.ttl: Arsenal 0-1 Tottenham Hotspur: Top 10 talking points
arts.sum: Though Frank has played some version of a 4-3-3 / 4-2-3-1 in each preseason fixture, he has tinkered with the shape and lineup each time; and this match was no different. Spurs often struggled to break into the penalty area through the match, lacking a creative presence around the box; however, they made up for that with some dangerous set pieces to create chances.

arts.ttl: What we learned as Spurs beat Arsenal in Hong Kong
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur beat Arsenal in the first north London derby outside of the UK thanks to Pape Matar Sarr's excellent long-range chip.
